name: RetroScope
description: RetroScope is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and classic console buttons, it brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Equipped with its trusty hand-down arms and legs, RetroScope is always ready to assist in any technical endeavor. Its classic screen provides a clear and precise display, while the stylish glasses add a touch of sophistication to its appearance.
